name: SubmitCompensationScorecardResult
description:
Submit a Compensation Scorecard result for evaluation.

Use this tool to submit a Compensation Scorecard result with a specified evaluation date in 'yyyy-mm-dd' format. Ensure you have the Workday ID from a Compensation Scorecard. This is secured by 'Set Up: Merit and Bonus' and requires the 'Advanced Compensation' scope.

parameters.name: compensation_scorecard_data
parameters.description: JSON object containing 'compensationScorecard' ID and 'evaluationDate' in 'yyyy-mm-dd' format.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Workday API

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
